content: hot/cold cup sleeve a crochet pattern by pannda fibre arts notes this pattern is written in us crochet terms materials worsted/#4 acrylic yarn ~25-35 yards 4mm g hook yarn needle terms st s = stitch es chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase treble_crochet = treble/triple crochet gauge is not important for this item ©pannda fibre arts 2025
